title: Men's Classic Slim Fit Stretchy Jeans for Men Skinny Flex Denim Pants Ripped Designer
description: Super stretch, these slim fit jeans for men are made of cotton and spandex. Cotton ensure comfort and soft to touch, while spandex can increase elasticity, making these flex jeans can be more fitted and comfortable.
Butt lifting, you will look more fashion and confident when you snug into these slim fit jeans, the elastic waist fits most of the body types. Without any restrictions to show your powerful bottoms.

High quality, we use stretch and strong firm denim, smooth zipper, value craftsmanship, and also upgrade the pocket, so you can fit your entire hand into these pockets and put your phone inside for better care.

With simple but stylish styles, suitable for party and business and any outdoor occasions. Basic plain jeans, easy to match. Ripped and repaired jeans, with additional stylish elements, more younger looking for you.

Machine washable, no faded, no strange smell, give you a best stretch jeans travel experience. Please order normal size you usually wear, the waist size is US size, and the inseam length is about 30 inch. Model is 188cm(6'2"), 88kg(194lb), wear size 32.
